data.eml:eml: Type Localities of Heteroptera (Insecta: Hemiptera) from Turkey

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dursun, Ahmet, Fent, Meral (2017): Type Localities of Heteroptera (Insecta: Hemiptera) from Turkey. Zootaxa 4227 (4): 451-494, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4227.4.1
